name: Easy & simple FAQ
author: webcomet FAQ

sections.description:
Easy & simple FAQ allows you to quickly create an accessible FAQ that you can either embed on a page or use as a widget that shows up in the bottom right corner on all pages.

Features:
– Easy to use FAQ editor (text, lists, links, images & videos etc)
– Accordion style FAQ for embedding on a specific page
– FAQ Widget for showing up on all pages on your website
– Search features (automatically shows up if more than 4 questions)
– Responsive and works on any device
– WCAG Compliant for accessibility

Easy & simple FAQ relies on a third-party service called webcomet FAQ. The data created in the plugin will be sent to and stored in the webcomet FAQ service.

This plugin offers a small selection of features from the webcomet FAQ service. If you need more features for your FAQ, you can read more about the service (which is free) on https://www.webcomet.io

Terms of Service: https://www.webcomet.io/terms.html
Privacy policy: https://www.privacypolicies.com/live/520d22cd-0f8d-4638-a0b5-805d2e58e6df
